change.changenote: Section 1 (1) definition of "protective purposes" was added by BC Reg 239/2021, effective September 1, 2022.
Section 1 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 239/2021, effective September 1, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The practice of agrology does not include the provision of advice or services within the reserved practice of a registrant of another regulatory body.

change.changenote: Section 1 (1) definition of "limited licence agrologist" was added by BC Reg 191/2022, effective October 1, 2022.
Section 3 (e) was added by BC Reg 191/2022, effective October 1, 2022.
Section 4 was enacted by BC Reg 239/2021, effective September 1, 2022.
Section 4 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 191/2022, effective October 1, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 51 (1) (b) [reserved practice] of the Act, the practice of agrology described in paragraph (a) (ii) of the definition of "practice of agrology" is a reserved practice that may only be carried out by or under the supervision of a registrant, if the practice relates to providing advice or another service that, having regard to the protective purposes, requires the experience or technical knowledge of an agrologist.
